mapper.select: SELECT rb.RECRUITMENT_ID, rb.TITLE, cs.category_sub_name, rbt.BOARD_NAME, cl.CURRENT_STD_COUNT, rb.wish_pay, u.NICKNAME FROM RECRUITMENT_BOARD rb INNER JOIN CONCERN c ON rb.RECRUITMENT_ID = c.recruitment_std_id INNER JOIN CLASS cl ON rb.class_id = cl.class_id INNER JOIN CATEGORY_SUB cs ON cl.category_sub_id = cs.category_sub_id INNER JOIN USERS u ON rb.ID = u.ID INNER JOIN RECRUITMENT_BOARD_TYPE rbt ON rb.RECRUITMENT_BOARD_ID = rbt.RECRUITMENT_BOARD_ID WHERE rb.RECRUITMENT_ID IS NOT NULL AND c.recruitment_std_id IS NOT NULL
select count(*) from concern where USER_ID = #{user_id} and RECRUITMENT_STD_ID = #{recruitment_std_id}
mapper.insert: insert into CONCERN (CONCERN_ID, RECRUITMENT_STD_ID, USER_ID, CONCERN_DATE) values (concern_seq.nextval, #{recruitment_std_id}, #{user_id}, sysdate)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CONCERN WHERE RECRUITMENT_STD_ID = #{recruitment_std_id} and USER_ID = #{user_id}
